itunes:title: My Family's Forever Banana Bread
itunes:author: Kristen Miglore
itunes:summary: After writing about many other recipes over the years, this is the one I just can’t quit. For the final installment of our Genius Homecoming miniseries, Kristen shares *the* banana bread recipe she returns to again and again.
itunes:subtitle: After writing about many other recipes over the years, this is the one I just can’t quit. For the final installment of our Genius Homecoming miniseries, Kristen shares *the* banana bread recipe she returns to again and again.
